section.title: Viewing cards in a list
section.p: Mingle's List view is the default card view and as the name suggests, simply lists cards in a project (similar to Excel).
To view cards in a list, select the cards you want to work with and then click the List link.

section.title: How to view cards in a list

steps.item: Sign in to Mingle and open the project for which to view cards in a list (if you're not currently working in the project).

Click the All tab.
Mingle displays all cards in the project in List view by default (as in the screen shot below). You can also click any other tab that displays cards.

item.p: Filter the card list to isolate the cards you want to work with. If you have existing similar tabs or favorites setup, you can open one of these as a starting point and then change the filters.
If Mingle is currently displaying cards in a Grid, click the List link. Mingle displays all cards on the page in a list format.
If the List view comprises more than one page, scroll down to the bottom of the page to navigate all cards.
Click a number to go directly to that page, or click Next to navigate to the next page.

steps.item: If you want to view all details for a card, or to edit an individual card, click on the card's name or number.
